semantic_title: Dementia Coding - Etiology, Severity and Documentation Requirements
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 5. Chapter 5: Mental, Behavioral and Neurodevelopmental disorders > d. Dementia

content.full_text: The ICD-10-CM classifies dementia (categories F01, F02, and F03) on the basis of the etiology and severity (unspecified, mild, moderate or severe). Selection of the appropriate severity level requires the provider's clinical judgment and codes should be assigned only on the basis of provider documentation (as defined in the Official Guidelines for Coding and Reporting), unless otherwise instructed by the classification. If the documentation does not provide information about the severity of the dementia, assign the appropriate code for unspecified severity. If a patient is admitted to an inpatient acute care hospital or other inpatient facility setting with dementia at one severity level and it progresses to a higher severity level, assign one code for the highest severity level reported during the stay. (Evidence: pg no: 45, L74-L77)
content.summary: Establishes classification system for dementia based on etiology and severity, with specific requirements for provider documentation and severity progression during inpatient stays (Evidence: pg no: 45, L74-L77)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Assign codes only based on provider documentation (Evidence: pg no: 45, L76)
detailed_rules.explanation: Dementia severity codes require explicit provider documentation as defined in the Official Guidelines (Evidence: pg no: 45, L76)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Use unspecified severity when documentation lacks severity information (Evidence: pg no: 45, L76-L77)
detailed_rules.explanation: When provider documentation does not specify dementia severity, assign the unspecified severity code (Evidence: pg no: 45, L76-L77)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Assign highest severity level during inpatient stay (Evidence: pg no: 45, L77)
detailed_rules.explanation: When dementia progresses during inpatient stay, code the highest severity level documented during the entire stay (Evidence: pg no: 45, L77)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Identify dementia etiology (F01, F02, or F03)
Step 2: Review provider documentation for severity
Step 3: If severity documented, assign appropriate severity code
Step 4: If severity not documented, use unspecified severity
Step 5: For inpatient stays, use highest severity documented during stay
